Plot: Two young women waitressing at a greasy spoon diner strike up an unlikely friendship in the hopes of launching a successful business - if only they can raise the cash.
Language: English, Korean, Yiddish, Hebrew, Spanish, Arabic, Ukrainian
Title: 2 Broke Girls
Actors: Kat Dennings, Beth Behrs, Garrett Morris, Jonathan Kite
Awards: Won 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 wins & 20 nominations.
